Where's the Boss

A game about betrayal.

What is Where's the Boss?

Whereâ€™s the Boss is a 5-player hidden role game played on Discord. It's a game about the hide and seek between a Mafia gang and the Police. Within 3 rounds, the Police needs to capture the Mafia Boss with the help of the Traitor.

How to Setup?

Make sure you have these things on your Discord server

Where's the Boss Discord Bot

A Text Channel

A Voice Channel

Another Voice Channel

  • One voice channel is referred to as the "Game Room".
  • The other one is referred to as the "Boss' Hideout".
  • Admin could turn off the notification of the text channel.
  • Everyone joins the "Game Room".
  • The player who recently been to airport types /start in the text channel to start the game.
  • Players join the game by typing /join in the text channel.

Roles

The Mafia Faction

Mafia Boss

1 Player

You are the Mafia Boss, you need to meet with your Mafia Members in the following three rounds. You need to decide carefully where your members should go, and try to decipher who is the traitor in your gang.

Mafia Members

2 Players

You are the Mafia Member working for the Boss, you need to meet with the Boss in the following three rounds. In order to avoid the police meeting with the Boss in the same location, you can try to deceive the Police by pretending to be a traitor and gaining their trust to mislead them.

The Police Faction

Police

1 Player

You are the Police, working to catch the Boss in 3 rounds by meeting with the Boss in the same location. You need to decipher who is the traitor and work closely with them.

Traitor

1 Player

You are the Traitor of the Mafia gang, the Boss has mistreated you for a long time. Thus, you want to betray the Boss by secretly giving out information to the Police to help them catch the Boss, and at the same time, pretend to be a Mafia Member.

How to Play?

Scheme Phase

  • The Boss enters the Boss' Hideout with a Mafia Member to discuss their location for the round.
  • There are 5 locations: airport, bar, casino, hotel and villa.
  • When the time ends, the Boss sends off the Mafia Member and calls another one to the Boss' Hideout.
  • Repeat until the Boss has met with all three Mafia Members.
  • Everyone in the Game Room can chat with anyone publicly or privately during this phase.

Meeting Phase

  • Everyone decides where to go in 60 seconds.
  • The Boss is not allowed to chat with anyone during this phase.
  • All players set their locations using the /goto command before revealing the result.
  • After all players finished choosing their location, the Boss uses the /reveal command to reveal all players' locations.
  • Start a new round if no win condition have been met.

How to Win?

The Grand Escape

Without being caught by the Police, the Boss gains 4 points

Loner

After 3 rounds, the Boss doesn't have 4 points

The Catch

The Police chooses the same location as the Boss

Commands

/start

Type the command in a text channel to start the game.

/stop

Type the command in the text channel to stop the game.

/restart

Type the command in the text channel to restart the game.

/join

Players could type this command in the text channel to join the game.

/goto [location]

This command is used to set the player's location.

[location] is one of the following values: airport, bar, casino, hotel, villa

/barrier [location]

This command is for the Police to set their barrier.

[location] is one of the following values: airport, bar, casino, hotel, villa

/reveal

This command reveals everyone's location in one round.

/history

This command logs all the game history.

Tips

Mafia Boss

  • You can give out false hints about your location if you donâ€™t trust the Mafia Member.
  • You can coordinate with real Mafia Members to give the Police a false location.

Police

  • You need to identify who the real Traitor is.
  • You could coordinate with the Traitor to deceive the Boss.
  • You could pretend to trust a fake Traitor to exclude false locations.

Mafia Member

  • You can earn the Policeâ€™s trust by disguising as the Traitor.
  • You can privately chat with other Mafia Members to exchange information.

Traitor

  • You need to disguise yourself as a Mafia Member when meeting with the Boss.
  • You need to prove yourself that you are the real Traitor to the Police.
